title: Rosa prepays Rs 850 crore debt to Singapore company
description: Rosa Power, a subsidiary of Reliance Power, has prepaid â‚¹850 crore of its debt to Varde Partners. The company aims to settle its remaining debt by the end of the financial year. This move strengthens Rosa Power's balance sheet and supports Reliance Power's expansion into the renewable energy sector.
